MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G67 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Clouden Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.24pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigatethe cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.45pm on the 17th of February 2021.
